main event: An unidentified flying object was observed zig-zagging across the sky and then moving towards the horizon at a high speed.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on January 21, 1956, at approximately 0804Z., The object was described as star-colored and about five times its diameter in length., It traveled at a constant high rate of speed for about 5 seconds before disappearing., The observer likened its motion to that of a rocket., The final conclusion of the report was that it was likely a meteor sighting.
sighted object: a star-colored object moving in a zig-zag pattern
witness description: The observer was a Danish citizen and Second Mate with 15 years of sea experience.
